data.title: Best Movies and TV shows Like The Bullwinkle Show
meta_keywords: movies similar to The Bullwinkle Show
animated movies like The Bullwinkle Show

data.meta_description: Movies and TV Shows Similar to The Bullwinkle Show: George of the Jungle (1967), Men in Black: The Series (1997), Tweety's High-Flying Adventure (2000), Spirit of the Forest (2008), Doogal (2006), Dreamworks Spooky Stories (2012), The Reef 2: High Tide (2012), Tripping the Rift: The Movie (2008), Knight Rusty (2013), Donkey X (2007)

TV show

Story: Main continuing story involved Rocky and Bullwinkle in conflict with spies Boris and Natasha. Other segments included "Fractured Fairy Tales", "Peabody's Improbable History" (smart dog Peabody and his boy Sherman get in the way-back machine), the "Adventures of Dudley Doright" (Canadian Mountie vs. evil Snidley) and "Aesop and Son" (odd telling of the famous fables).
